thread.title: Mum’s heartache as daughter, 16, died in her sleep after drinking Frosty Jack’s – dubbed ‘the cheapest booze on sale in the UK’
thread.title_full: Mum’s heartache as daughter, 16, died in her sleep after drinking Frosty Jack’s – dubbed ‘the cheapest booze on sale in the UK’

author: schristie
title: Mum’s heartache as daughter, 16, died in her sleep after drinking Frosty Jack’s – dubbed ‘the cheapest booze on sale in the UK’
text:
Opinion 'MEGAN WAS A ONE-OFF' Mum’s heartache as daughter, 16, died in her sleep after drinking Frosty Jack’s – dubbed ‘the cheapest booze on sale in the UK’ 
Megan Craig-Wilkinson, 16, of Dudley, North Tyneside, was found dead by her mum the morning after a New Year party with friends
